sentences.en: A system is in place to prioritize work orders.
sentences.cn: 已有决定工作单的优先次序的系统.

sentences.en: Ability to promptly respond to line problems and prioritize activities.
sentences.cn: 能够快速回应流水线上的问题和优先采取措施.

sentences.en: Businesspeople prioritize profit above all else.
Generate a list of personal brand attributes, and then prioritize them.
sentences.cn: 做出一份个人品牌特征清单, 按优先次序将它们排好.

sentences.en: Make lists of what to do and prioritize your tasks.
sentences.cn: 将要做的事情列出来，然后决定其优先顺序。

sentences.en: Next, take your? 20? column and prioritize it.
sentences.cn: 下一步, 要你? 20? 列和优先考虑.

sentences.en: Prioritize the tasks and find out what any vague wording exactly means.
sentences.cn: 把各项工作的优先次序区别开来,然后弄懂那些模糊的措辞确切指的是什么.

sentences.en: Prioritize work? related parties and attend only the most important ones.
sentences.cn: 优先考虑与工作有关的社交聚会,只参加最重要的.

sentences.en: Prioritize. Throw out any that just don't fit and make a prioritized list of the rest.
sentences.cn: 挑选. 剔除那些不符合的,然后将剩下的名字排列出先后顺序.

sentences.en: Search tools that let you prioritize items by category, location, and distance.
sentences.cn: 搜寻工具,让你把物品按类别 、 位置和距离.
简化你的日程表并排好先后顺序.

sentences.en: The public wants to see the fight against crime prioritized.
sentences.cn: 公众希望能把打击犯罪放在第一位。

sentences.en: Thus, prioritize function over form because that's where the real action is.
sentences.cn: 因此, 功能性高于形式是因为它是真正能够让访问者付诸于行动的东西.

sentences.en: Try to compartmentalize and prioritize the challenges you are facing.
sentences.cn: 试着将所面临的困难“划分”、“优先”.

sentences.en: We have too many things to do and must prioritize.
sentences.cn: 我们有许多事情要做,必须安排出优先顺序.

sentences.en: You need to prioritize your tasks.
sentences.cn: 你需要按照轻重缓急安排自己的工作。

sentences.en: You should make a list of all the jobs you have to do and prioritize them.
sentences.cn: 你应该把所有必须做的事都列出来，并按轻重缓急排个顺序。

words.tran_cn: 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事

trans.tran_en: to deal with one thing first, because it is the most important

trans.tran_cn: 按重要性排列，划分优先顺序，优先处理
